movies.title: Avengers
movies.actors: Linda Ballantyne , Tony Daniels , Ron Rubin
movies.plot: This series tells the stories of Marvel Comics greatest general membership superhero teams (as opposed to a family organization like the Fantastic Four or a minority group organization like the X-Men). Led by Hank Pym as Ant-Man and Janet van Dyne as the Wasp, they fight evil around the world and beyond against threats like Ultron.
movies.name: Avengers

movies.title: Intacto
movies.writers: Juan Carlos Fresnadillo , Andrés M. Koppel
movies.actors: Max von Sydow , Eusebio Poncela , Leonardo Sbaraglia
movies.plot: An enigmatic tale of four incredibly lucky people whose lives are intertwined by destiny are subject to the laws of fate. They discover that they cannot afford to be without luck as they gamble with the highest stakes possible in a deadly game.
movies.production: Canal+ España, Gestevisión Telecinco S.A., Sogecine
movies.name: Intacto

movies.title: Bucket List
movies.actors: Helen Arney , Raychelle Burks , Debbie Berebichez
movies.plot: We're creating the ultimate bucket list. We'll learn how to cook bread with a volcano, build underwater hotel rooms, and go eyeball-to-eyeball with Great Whites.
movies.name: Bucket List

movies.title: Into the Badlands
movies.writers: Heck Allen  (short story "The Streets of Laredo") (as Will Henry), Marcia Muller  (short story "The Time of the Wolves")
movies.actors: Bruce Dern , Mariel Hemingway , Helen Hunt
movies.plot: A bounty hunter searches the west for a wanted outlaw named Red Roundtree.
movies.production: MCA Television Entertainment (MTE), Ogiens / Kane Company
movies.name: Into the Badlands

movies.title: Saved
movies.actors: Leo Howard , Liza Koshy , Adam Hicks
movies.plot: Diesel gets shot stealing the hazmat suit. Connor breaks free and holds Violet hostage to get it back but the students make sure it's not easy for him to leave. Natalie starts to show the effects of the poison.
movies.name: Saved

movies.title: Contagion
movies.actors: Kurt Angle , Marem Hassler , Katarina Leigh Waters
movies.plot: An infectious passenger on an incoming flight starts a search for others who might be spreading a highly infectious disease around Los Angeles.
movies.name: Contagion

movies.title: Wind
movies.actors: Matthew Modine , Jennifer Grey , Cliff Robertson
movies.plot: Will Parker, played by Matthew Modine, loses the Americas Cup, the worlds biggest sailing prize, to the Australians and decides to form his own syndicate to win it back.
movies.name: Wind

movies.title: Skull
movies.actors: Chuck Connors , Johnny Crawford , Paul Fix
movies.plot: Out hunting for game, Lucas and Mark are separated after Mark has a fall and knocks himself unconscious. While searching for him, Lucas is taken prisoner by Holt Coyle, the owner of the notorious Skull Ranch that has become a haven for outlaws. Coyle thinks he's found the perfect man to get rid of the pesky local town Marshal and after Holt has found Mark and taken him prisoner, Lucas feels he has little choice but to go along with Coyle until an opportunity arises.
movies.production: Four Star Productions, Four Star Television, Sussex Productions
movies.name: Skull

movies.title: Seagull
movies.actors: Catharine Pilafas , Kathryn Phipps , Catherine Fridey
movies.plot: Denise Minard flees to a WWII British and French resistance camp, to bring urgent intelligence. She must answer all of HQ's questions or her true identity will be revealed.
movies.name: Seagull
